GK19ghatgu_u:401: 8 mara||. yūth[i]kālatāṃ - yūtha(!)kā vṛkṣavallī, cumbati jighrati ||
GK19ghatgu_u:402: 9 kiṃ kṛtvā - madhuna|| vasantasya, caittrasya vā. madhu madye, madhu kṣaudre, madhu
GK19ghatgu_u:403: 10 puṣparase vidu|| | madhu caittre, madhuś caittre, madhuko [']pi madhu smṛta|| ||
GK19ghatgu_u:404: 11 kālatāṃ nāśatāṃ samavekṣya | samaye ca nāśe kāla|| kīnāśe
GK19ghatgu_u:405: 12 kāla ity api Amara||. samavekṣya samyag jñātvā. kīdṛśīṃ latāṃ - ku[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:406: 13 sumai|| puṣpair, upaśobhitāṃ ramaṇīyāṃ | kīdṛśai|| kusumai|| - sitai||
GK19ghatgu_u:407: 14 śvetai|| || puna|| kīdṛśai|| | ghanair meghair, muktā ye [']mbulavā jalaka[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:408: 15 ṇās, tai||, prabhāsitāni śobhitāni, tai||. daśapadāny asya. atrāpi
GK19ghatgu_u:410: 17 pīḍitāyās tasyā vaca|| khalu dayālur apīḍitāyā|| [|] sā[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:411: 18 dhvībhir evam uditaṃ jaladair amoghai|| pratyāyayau sadanam ūna[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:412: 19 dinair amoghai|| 21 khalu niścayena dayālur api sa puru[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:414: 1 amoghai|| saphalai<||>r ūnadinair <'>alpadinai||, sadanaṃ gṛhaṃ, pratyā<'>[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:415: 2 yayau ājagāmety artha|| | kiṃ kṛtvā - tasyā|| priyāyā||, etat pū[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:416: 3 rvoktaṃ vaco, niśamyāṅgīkṛtya | śrutvety artha|| | kiṃbhūtaṃ - amoghais saphalai||,
GK19ghatgu_u:417: 4 jaladair meghai||, sādhvībhis sakhībhiś ca kṛtvā, evam uditaṃ vadi[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:418: 5 tam ity artha|| || kiṃviśiṣṭāyā|| viraheti. virahād utpanno yo
GK19ghatgu_u:419: 6 [']nala|| pāvaka||, kṛśā<ṇ>[n]u|| pāvako [']nala ity Amara|| [1.1.55], tena pīḍi[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:420: 7 tāyā|| du||khitāyā||. yad vā - viraha ev<'>ānalas, tena pīḍitāyā||.
GK19ghatgu_u:421: 8 puna|| kīdṛśyā|| - īḍitāyā||. īḍyate stūyate bhartā aneneti, tasyā||.
GK19ghatgu_u:422: 9 ktapratyay[a i]ṭ ca [vgl. SV 286,19-20]. ekonaviṃśatipado [']yam | etan niśamyetyāditriṣu
GK19ghatgu_u:423: 10 vasantatilakā cchanda|| || 21 || tāsām ṛtu|| saphala eva
GK19ghatgu_u:424: 11 hi yā dineṣu sendrāyudhāmbudharagarjitadurdineṣu [|] ratyutsavaṃ pri[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:425: 12 yatamai|| saha mānayanti meghāgame priyasakhīś ca samānayanti || 22 ||
GK19ghatgu_u:427: 14 indrāyudhena saha vartate sendrāyudha, etādṛśo 'mbudharas, tasya garjitena
GK19ghatgu_u:428: 15 durdineṣu. priyatamai|| saha ratyutsavaṃ mānayanti kurvanti. tāsāṃ strīṇāṃ,
GK19ghatgu_u:431: saphala eva iti. [[cakārāt meghāgame ye puṃsa||
GK19ghatgu_u:437: 18 ratai|| śapeyam [|] jīyeya yena kavinā yamakai|| pareṇa
GK19ghatgu_u:438: 19 tasmai vaheyam udakaṃ ghaṭakharpareṇa || 23 || atha kavi||
GK19ghatgu_u:439: 20 kāvyakāṭhinyād ātmagarvaṃ prakaṭayan śapathayati - yena pareṇā[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:441: 1 madadhikenety artha|| | ahaṃ yamakai|| ślokai|| kṛtvā, jīyeya ślokā[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:442: 2 rthavyākhyānenaiva jita||. ji jaye [SV 240,21] liṅi uttamapuruṣaika[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:443: 3 vacana īyavibhaktiś cāgre, karmaṇi yak dīrghaś ca, k[a]tvād gu[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:445: 5 na kevalaṃ jita, api tu ahaṃ tasmai kavaye, udakaṃ jalaṃ, va[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:446: 6 heyaṃ upaḍhaukayāmīty artha|| || vaha prāpaṇe [SV 228,31] | yām iyaṃ [SV 211,21] etvaṃ ca.
GK19ghatgu_u:447: 7 kena - ghaṭakharpareṇa kumbhārdhabhāgena | kiṃ kṛtvā | tṛṣitas san ||
GK19ghatgu_u:448: 8 ambu <'ā>[[a]]mbha|| [[ālabhya]] prāpyety artha|| || tṛṣito [']pi, ghaṭakharpareṇa tasmai <||>
GK19ghatgu_u:449: 9 jalam <'>ādāya, paścāt svayaṃ pibāmīti kāṭhinyaṃ | alpamātraṃ <|>
GK19ghatgu_u:450: 10 jalaṃ dravaṇāvaśeṣaṃ ānayiṣyasīti cet, tatrāha || kiṃbhūtaṃ <|>
GK19ghatgu_u:451: 11 ambu - karakośapeyaṃ. karakośena hastapātreṇa. kośas tu ku<ṭ>[ḍ]ma[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:452: 12 le pātre (!) iti Yādava|| | peyaṃ pīyate iti [peyam], ī[c] cāta[||] [SV 451,32], anena ya[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:453: 13 pratyaya[s] syād, ākārasya c[[e]]kāra|| [SV 451,32]. añjaliṃ pūrya jalaṃ pibet ||
GK19ghatgu_u:454: 14 īdṛśam <'>ānayeyaṃ, na tv alpam iti bhāva|| || yadi no<'>paḍhaukayā[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:455: 15 mi <||> tadāhaṃ, bhāvenānuraktā yā vanitā yoṣit, tasyā|| sura[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:456: 16 tāni sambhogāni - tai||, śapeyaṃ śapathaṃ kuryāṃ || śapanaṃ śapatha||
GK19ghatgu_u:457: 17 pumān ity Amara|| [1.5.9] || iṣṭasya hi śapatha|| kriyate. ata|| Śrī[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:460: 20 l[[i]]dāsasyāśay[o] naiva prakāśyate || pāṭhaṃ vinā. mayā ṭīkā padyānāṃ 23.
GK19ghatgu_u:461: 1 dviśatāni ca || nirmitā bhūmidevānāṃ vṛndaṃ natvā gurūn api ||
GK19ghatgu_u:463: 3 Kuśalākhyena dhīmatā || 3 || yugmaṃ || Śrīpatir jyotiṣāṃ madhye yo
GK19ghatgu_u:464: 4 [']bhūc chreṣṭho hi śarmabhāk || tasya pautreṇa ṭikeyaṃ kṛtā śreṣṭhāti[=]
GK19ghatgu_u:466: 6 m indurkṣe cādyayogake || nāgavedācalābje [1748] tu cābde [']bhūd Gūḍhadīpikā || 5 ||
GK19ghatgu_u:469: 9 āṣāḍha vati 12 pāriteyaṃ mayā Rājānānandarāmeṇeti śubham oṃ || ~ ||   2.1. Noten zum Text
